classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, (B3 [lab] must be completed with either B1 or B2), B4, B4, Lower-Division B, Upper-Division B, C2, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, and E. Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirement before senior year. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites.
Select one of the following: SPAN402, SPAN410, SPAN416, or SPAN470.
Select one of the following: SPAN303, SPAN305, SPAN307, SPAN340, SPAN390.

Any Minor Course or SPAN 300-400 Level Course can go here.

With department approval, any declared academic minor, plus 2-8 units of SPAN 300-400 level courses to reach 32 units. Minor and SPAN coursework used here may not double count with SPAN major core requirements or approved electives.
